<h1 class="is-style-default" style="margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0">Continuous<strong> </strong>learning</h1>



<p class="has-foreground-color has-text-color">Understand and adopt new approaches to teamwork and technology.</p>



<hr class="wp-block-separator has-text-color has-gray-40-color has-alpha-channel-opacity has-gray-40-background-color has-background is-style-wide" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30)"/>
</div>

<div class="is-layout-flow wp-block-column content-column" style="padding-top:0;padding-right:0;padding-bottom:0;padding-left:0;flex-basis:70%">
<div class="is-layout-constrained wp-block-group">
<h2 id="training" style="margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0">Training</h2>



<p>The <a href="https://learningcentre.gww.gov.bc.ca/learninghub/learning_partner/digital-academy/">Digital Academy</a> supports employees in the development of digital and data skills required for a modern BC Public Service. </p>



<p>This includes access to digital tools and resources, instruction on digital methodologies and principles and applications in day-to-day settings that allow for more efficient workflow and improved service delivery.</p>



<p>Visit the <a href="https://learningcentre.gww.gov.bc.ca/learninghub/learning_partner/digital-academy/" title="LearningHUB to register">LearningHUB</a> to register for courses like:</p>



<ul>
<li>Agile fundamentals</li>



<li>Digital literacy</li>



<li>Introduction to journey mapping</li>



<li>OpenShift 101</li>
</ul>

		<script>
	( function() {
		var skipLinkTarget = document.querySelector( 'main' ),
			sibling,
			skipLinkTargetID,
			skipLink;

		// Early exit if a skip-link target can't be located.
		if ( ! skipLinkTarget ) {
			return;
		}

		// Get the site wrapper.
		// The skip-link will be injected in the beginning of it.
		sibling = document.querySelector( '.wp-site-blocks' );

		// Early exit if the root element was not found.
		if ( ! sibling ) {
			return;
		}

		// Get the skip-link target's ID, and generate one if it doesn't exist.
		skipLinkTargetID = skipLinkTarget.id;
		if ( ! skipLinkTargetID ) {
			skipLinkTargetID = 'wp--skip-link--target';
			skipLinkTarget.id = skipLinkTargetID;
		}

		// Create the skip link.
		skipLink = document.createElement( 'a' );
		skipLink.classList.add( 'skip-link', 'screen-reader-text' );
		skipLink.href = '#' + skipLinkTargetID;
		skipLink.innerHTML = 'Skip to content';

		// Inject the skip link.
		sibling.parentElement.insertBefore( skipLink, sibling );
	}() );
